SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN s.STAFF_SCOPE = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS full_time_job_count, SUM(CASE WHEN s.JOB_TYPE = 1 AND s.STAFF_SCOPE = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS on_job_count, 0 trail_count, 0 establish_count, ( SELECT count(po.POST_ID) post_count FROM mp_post_org po LEFT JOIN mp_organization org on po.ORG_ID=org.id

AND o.ORG_CODE LIKE concat(#{orgCode},'%')
